pages.text: $(#ffa500)$(l)Xaero’s Minimap$(reset) is present at all times in the corner of your screen. It’s highly customizable, so I encourage you to $(l)open up its options$(reset) with $(k:gui.xaero_minimap_settings) and tweak it to your likings.

Among others some of its best features are the ability to display slime chunks (which can be activated with the $(k:gui.xaero_toggle_slime) key), the entity radar tracking all the nearby entities and many more. The map also shows your $(l)$(l:patchouli:xaeros/xaeros_waypoints)waypoints$(/l)$(reset).
